posts.raw_content:
My faith and love in Jesus are strong.  The trials I currently face are near overwhelming.  A father who is at the end stages of Alzheimer's and a mother who is in crippling pain almost every day.   Legal and financial issues are closing in and I feel like I need all the help from God I can get.   
 
I know God is merciful and just.  I know I have received more in this life with family and friends than I have any right to.   I am not thinking of doing anything rash - God has helped me through incredibly difficult times and saved me twice from almost certain death.   
 
If you would say a prayer more me, that God will get me through this with His mercy, I would be eternally grateful.
posts.author: Necrovoter
posts.title: Please Pray for Me
posts.content:
My faith and love in Jesus are strong. The trials I currently face are near overwhelming. A father who is at the end stages of Alzheimer's and a mother who is in crippling pain almost every day. Legal and financial issues are closing in and I feel like I need all the help from God I can get.

I know God is merciful and just. I know I have received more in this life with family and friends than I have any right to. I am not thinking of doing anything rash - God has helped me through incredibly difficult times and saved me twice from almost certain death.

If you would say a prayer more me, that God will get me through this with His mercy, I would be eternally grateful.
